medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive respiratory decline with treatment-refractory hypoxemia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis at 49 years of age. Pulmonary-function testing 2 months before admission revealed a severe restrictive ventilatory defect and decreased diffusing capacity. His respiratory status declined precipitously over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had hyperlipidemia, type 2 diabetes mellitus, treated vitamin B12 deficiency, and mild pancytopenia. Previous diagnosis of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's father had pulmonary fibrosis confirmed by biopsy. One sister died of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, a second sister had thrombocytopenia and idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis confirmed at autopsy, and a third sister had idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis and died from acute myeloid leukemia.
medical_history.social_history: The patient was a lifelong non-smoker.
